      • addDeadPlayer

        public void addDeadPlayer(Player deadPlayer)
        this method removes a player from the board and puts it aside to have its board scored at the end of the current turn
        Parameters:
        deadPlayer - the player that has just been killed

      • activateFinalFrenzy

        public void activateFinalFrenzy(int activePlayer)
        this method builds the action tile frenzy objects for each player and the method checks and sends the right amount of frenzy actions to the constructor.
        Parameters:
        activePlayer - is the player that has to play the first frenzy turn (sent by the controller)
